title: North Texas convicted felon sentenced to 25 years in federal prison on methamphetamine distribution conspiracy ...
text: ( Source : ICE - US Immigration and Customs Enforcement ) FORT WORTH, Texas - A North Texas convicted felon who pleaded guilty to his role in a methamphetamine distribution conspiracy was sentenced Thursday to 25 years in federal prison. This
